mapper.select: select no , name , id , password , enabled , email , birthdate, phone , address , point , role from member where id = #{id}

select m.no, m.name , m.id , m.password , m.enabled , m.email , m.birthdate , m.phone , m.address , m.point , m.role , m.brand_no as brandNo, b.name as brandName , s.no as storeNo from brand b join member m on m.brand_no = b.no join store s on s.no = m.store_no where m.id = #{id}
